title: Saris Swing Away Hitch adapter provides trunk access for select bike racks
content:
Tray style hitch racks are one of the best ways to carry your bikes. One of their few downsides though is that most of them will block access to your trunk. While there are a few bike racks that integrate a swing away adapter into their design, it’s become more common for rack makers to […]

The post Saris Swing Away Hitch adapter provides trunk access for select bike racks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
